name: Planet-O-baby
description:
A 2 minute long hardcore baby contemplative experience created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2019

Your objective is to continuously tap the balloons holding the baby to prevent something bad from happening.

Controls:
Use the arrow keys to rotate the camera on the Y axis.
Use left mouse click to tap the balloons.

Thank you.
(This game will be updated in the future to add new functionalities).
